item.title: üöù Exploring Las Colinas' Mothballed Monorail
item.description: Sign at the entrance of the APT On the surface, Dallas looks like just another cookie-cutter commuter city. Compared to Austin’s booming tech industry and laid-back vibe, Dallas’ historic hyperfocus on sprawling office parks has always felt a bit clinical. But the combination of this all-work all-the-time culture and a early 80’s real-estate boom led to some crazy planning experiments, and none were as crazy as the Irving’s Las Colinas community.

item.title: MGMT's Anti-Breakout Album: Congratulations
item.description: We are absolutely dead serious about music-making, and that‚Äôs what we want people to understand, that there‚Äôs no joke in it. We‚Äôre not intentionally trying to f*ck with people, we‚Äôre actually making this music that we love and we want people to hear it.1 ~ Ben Goldwasser You may not be familiar with MGMT, but anyone who had a pulse in the late 2000’s has most likely heard their work.
